task.title: Backing up using the browser interface
task.shortdesc: To provide a historical archive, back up on a regular schedule. Back up as needed when you perform less-frequent tasks such as moving data from one instance to another or duplicating an instance for testing or failover purposes.

step.cmd: Log in to the browser interface.
Click the Backup / Restore tab. The Backup / Restore page appears.
Click Create Backup. You are asked to confirm your selection by clicking Create Backup again.
step.stepresult: When the backup is complete, the .tgz file name is displayed. The default directory that receives backups is /opt/serviced/var/backups.
